S

Save - Class in dominiccobo.gameoflife.model
Class creates an ArrayList saver, adapted to work with the iterations saved by this program.
Save(GridIterator) - Constructor for class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.Save
Constructor for the Save class, specifies the grid iterator of which to retrieve the saveable content from.
SCREEN_HEIGHT - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.AboutView
Constant detailing default height for the about screen, change as necessary according to the displayed image's size.
SCREEN_HEIGHT - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.MainView
 
SCREEN_HEIGHT - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.SplashScreenView
Constant detailing default height for the splash screen, change as necessary according to the displayed image's size.
SCREEN_WIDTH - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.AboutView
Constant detailing default width for the about screen, change as necessary according to displayed image's size.
SCREEN_WIDTH - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.MainView
 
SCREEN_WIDTH - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.SplashScreenView
Constant detailing default width for the splash screen, change as necessary according to displayed image's size.
setFile(String) - Method in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.Save
Method specifies the filename and directory where it should be saved.
setGridState(int[][]) - Method in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.Grid
Update the status of the cells in a Grid instance conforming with the GRID_TYPE_SHADED definition, that is cells are either dead or alive with a varying degree of 'aliveness' or 'deadness' according to the time spent in either state.
setIteratorFrequency(int) - Method in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.GridIterator
Setter method for iteratorFrequency.
setType(int) - Method in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.Grid
Allows the specification of the grid cell type that will determine whether shade of the cells vary on alive time or not.
showAll() - Method in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.MainView
Set all panels and the main frame as visible.
sldrGridSize - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.MainView
 
sldrIterationSpeed - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.MainView
 
SPLASH_TIME - Static variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.SplashScreenView
Default long integer time to display the splash screen for.
splashImage - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.AboutView
Instance variable Image Icon displaying the 'about' splash screen picture.
splashImage - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.SplashScreenView
Instance variable detailing the ImageIcon displaying the splash screen image.
SplashScreenView - Class in dominiccobo.gameoflife.view
Models a "splash screen type-window" using a pure SWING API approach, rather than the traditional AWT approach.
SplashScreenView() - Constructor for class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.SplashScreenView
Constructor only serves the purpose of calling the initialization method 'init'.
splashWindow - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.SplashScreenView
Instance variable detailing JWindow container for holding the splash view.
STATE_ALIVE - Static variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.Grid
Constant int value association for an alive cell, for a grid with type definition GRID_TYPE_SHADED.
STATE_DEAD - Static variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.Grid
Constant int value association for a dead cell, for a grid with type definition GRID_TYPE_SHADED.
stateChanged(ChangeEvent) - Method in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.controller.Controller
Method from implemented ChangeListener model.
statusPanel - Variable in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.view.MainView
 
stop() - Method in class dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.GridIterator
Method terminating the running of the iterator.
